nodes.text: The Ragtag bunker was a bunker on the Core World of Corellia used by the criminal organization known as the Ragtags during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was located alongside a beach a relatively short distance southwest of Coronet City. Circa 1 ABY, a spacer working for CorSec Lieutenant Mack Jasper assaulted the bunker in order to arrest the Ragtag thug Tomi Jinsin for his involvement in the the theft of a shipment of starship components from Ral Mundi's Starship Emporium. The Ragtag sentries who patrolled the bunker attacked the spacer and Jinsin was killed in the firefight.
The Ragtag bunker was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.

The Ragtag bunker was added to the game with the release of the "Publish 21", on August 4, 2005. It was part of the quest named "Find the Missing Shipment of Starship Components", best known as "Ral Mundi's quest". Ral Mundi's quest was revamped with the release of the "Publish 27", on February 15, 2006, as the quest was inserted into the "Legacy Quest", the main questline in the game.
